data.actual_result: The dropdown opens on the bottom and countries at the end of the list can't be selected
data.expected_result: The dropdown opens on the top or has a lower height so countries at the end of the list can be selected
data.short_description: On the phone verification modal, the country list overflows on 150% zoom
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a server that requires phone verification without having a phone connected - Open the country list - Observe
